collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (16 total Queries, 16 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT q.Client_Id,c.Name,c.user_id as clientId,a.*,p.Id,p.Project_Name,p.Delivery_Date,p.Quotation_Id,p.Lump_Sump_Charges,p.Project_file,p.project_file_link,p.notes,p.project_type,p.deliver_file ,p.status as projectStatus FROM `quotations` q JOIN projects p on p.Quotation_Id = q.Id JOIN clients c on c.Id = q.Client_Id LEFT JOIN assignproject a on a.project_id = p.Id where p.Id = 232 GROUP by p.Id order by p.Id desc
UPDATE `notification` n SET n.`status`='1' where n.project_id = 232 and n.user_id is NULL
SELECT u.id,u.username,u.profile_image,ap.* FROM `assignproject` ap JOIN users u on ap.user_id = u.id WHERE ap.project_id = 232
SELECT count(u.id) as assignusercount FROM `assignproject` ap JOIN users u on ap.user_id = u.id WHERE ap.project_id = 232
SELECT pst.*,ps.* FROM projectscopetypes pst JOIN projectscopes ps on ps.ProjectScopeType = pst.Id where ps.Project_Id = 232

SELECT c.id, c.comment,c.user_id, c.parentComment_id, c.RFI, c.project_id, c.created_at, u.username, u.profile_image FROM comments c JOIN users u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE project_id = 232 ORDER BY created_at DESC;

SELECT c.id, c.comment,c.user_id, c.parentComment_id, c.RFI, c.project_id, c.created_at, u.username, u.profile_image FROM comments c JOIN users u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE project_id = 232 ORDER BY created_at asc;
SELECT MAX(p.progress) as max_progress FROM `projectprogress` p WHERE p.project_id = 232 and p.user_id = 3
SELECT p.*,u.username FROM `projectprogress` p JOIN users u on u.id = p.user_id WHERE p.project_id = 232 and p.user_id = 3 order by p.id desc
SELECT p.*,u.username FROM `projectprogress` p JOIN users u on u.id = p.user_id WHERE p.project_id = 232 order by p.id desc

SELECT user_id, project_id, AVG(max_progress) AS avg_max_progress FROM (SELECT user_id, project_id, MAX(progress) AS max_progress FROM projectprogress GROUP BY user_id, project_id ) AS max_progress_table GROUP BY user_id, project_id;
SELECT p.*,u.username FROM `projectprogress` p JOIN users u on u.id = p.user_id WHERE p.project_id = 232 order by p.id desc

SELECT q.*,c.Name as Client_Name, c.Email_Address as Client_EmailAddress FROM `quotations` q join `clients` c on q.Client_Id = c.Id JOIN projects p on p.Quotation_Id= q.Id WHERE p.Lump_Sump_Charges =0 GROUP by q.Id ORDER BY q.Id DESC
